content.detailedDescription: Halloween night, very cloudy, couple open spots where you can see star's, went outback to grab some firewood while smoking a cigarette i was looking up, headed east, easily breaching mach 5 speeds, for no more than 5 seconds there was a object that was a cylinder shape, a single strip of light around the rim of the object just pulsating, not flickering like a helicopter or plane or jet. then disappeared behind the clouds. i'm 22, my vision is as perfect as it gets. not to mention i live 10 minutes from the airport and see planes everyday all day, nothing ever looked like this, not my irst sighting like this either.
content.summary: Slow, cylindical object pulsating a single light all around rim of object.

content.detailedDescription: My mother tells me of a story that happened when she was a child. she was born in the year of 1935 , so this problematically took place between 1944 an 1946. was there any reports of such sighting at that time or location. there's more to the story but you would have to listen to it to believe it.
content.summary: Wittness as a child between the ages of 9 an 12.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Cigar shaped craft angular edges. yellow to yellowish green. round portals on side of craft facing me. figures behind each portal sitting still but to dark to make out. i don't remember hearing any sounds. busy traffic all around. i had one of my sons in a stroller with me. i was pointing to it and no one seemed to respond sort of like they didn't see me or maybe didn't care. it was like i was the only one seeing it, like they were all oblivious. it had some great size and mass to it. i forgot about it for years and some show i was watching about ufo blocking your memory brought it all back it just seemed to bring it back in a instant. like my memory had been blocked somehow. i don't remember the ufo leaving. it was like it was floating there stationary. i don't remember walking away and i don't remember it leaving. this isn't something i'm making up and it's also not the only ufo i've seen, but the other time i was with three other people and we all saw it, but it was nothing like this. it was pink lights in the sky, near power lines and doing things in the sky that plains or helicopters could not do. the movements were very close and intertwined. we all had the feeling that they were drawing or gathering energy. i don't think we all could have been imagining them.
content.summary: Yellowish green cigar shaped ufo with round portals with human shaped being in each portal. i could not make out features, just shapes.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding with a friend to go out of town to do some drinking. we had not begun to drink yet. as we crested the railroad viaduct leaving town i saw some lights in the sky across from the high school. thinking it was a helicopter i joked to my friend how cool it would be to see a ufo some time and we laughed about it. when we got in front of the high school i could see that the object was hovering near the tractor dealership across from the school. i had the driver stop at the west bottom drive to the school across from tractor dealership and we got out of the car to observe. i observed that the lights were sequencing counterclockwise and were horizontal with the ground. i estimated them at the time to be about 50' off the ground at approz. a 1/4 to 1/2 mile distance. at no time did i see any structure or hear any sound. after observing for about 1 minute the lights began a slow circle of the dealership with a tilt of about 30 degrees to the inside of the circle. when one circle was complete the object again levelled and crossed the highway in front of us to circle a cattle lot in front of us, again with the tilt to the inner part of it's path. when complete it crossed in front of us again back to the dealership to begin another round of the dealership. my friend reached into the drivers window of his car and began to flash his lights. the object instantaneously was flying to the north following the horizon and in a split second was a speck in the sky bfore disappearing for good. the lights never stopped sequencing during this event and even when speeding off never made a sound. the entire event was less than 5 minutes in duration.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw lights in sky when cresting bridge while leaving town.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog and i was looking a plan when i seen the object at first i thought it was a plane then seen it moving and changing colurs and flight path then quickly shot out of sight.
update:
i seen the object again at 8:21pm or 3 minutes.
location: maghull liverpool
date:1st november 2014
time:7:50pm
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange orb like object over maghull near liverpool

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were returning home when she noticed a bright neon blue light in the sw sky. it was 11:26 pm on oct. 30, 2014. i looked and it was lower and brighter than a star. it appeared about 1-2 miles away. it moved toward us - moving ne. it then made an erratic movement moving sharply to the left then down, lower in the sky, then to the right. it was at this time we knew it was not a plane, helicopter, flare, firework or anything else we have seen in the sky before. i grabbed my cell phone and took 3 pictures. the first did not capture it. the second captured it as we saw it and the 3rd image is blurred. not sure if it the camera moving on that one, but probably as i did not see any blur when watching the object. we watched it and when it moved to the right (nw) it stood still for about 30-45 seconds. it then moved in a straight direction away from us going sw and disappearing under clouds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw an unusually bright neon blue round light in sw sky. it grabbed our attention because of the color. it moved in directions that are not possible for a plane, helicopter or flare. it was moving when we saw it and then stopped. then moved west.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and saw this unusual sight in the sky. i parked the car in the garage, got the camera and went to the front of my next door neighbors house and took two pictures. i thought this was unusual, maybe a cloud formation. it drifted easterly with the clouds. didn't follow it, took the picture and went back into the house.
content.summary: Went to take a picture, it looked strange, had a tail, so i took two pics.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were traveling east on i-10  (towards phoenix) when we noticed 3 object to the south of us.  they were like white lights and were moving around oddly. then two of the objects went underneath the third object and it looked like the one object engulfed the other two. the shape then changed like a boomerang and there was a red glow to it.  the whole process was about 3 minutes.  one it changed to a boomerang shape it just hovered there.  we then had to go north and lost light of the object.  if you enlarge the object you will see the boomerang shape
content.summary: There were 3 objects then two of them went underneath the larger object and they all became one

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking photos of the clouds this day, and decided to time a photo to include a passenger jet that was passing through. i didn't notice anything unusual in the clouds when i took the photo, but only that the clouds look visually interesting. was surprised to see this hooligan looking gang of ufos (think west side story) hanging out on the "street corner" in the clouds as this plane came along.
content.summary: Hooligan ufos

content.detailedDescription: This photo should serve to confirm what i've learned from my observations of idos (interdimensioanl objects). a) they can create cloud cover for purposes of concealment. b) they have a sense of humor. i'm not kidding, these guys are quite the pranksters when they want to be. i've been subjected to mr flying sheet of paper on five separate occasions. they've dispatched it on three occasions during my breaks at work, just as soon as i go outside and light up a smoke, here it comes. i've ended up feeling like an innocent bystander in some crazy scene from a warner brothers cartoon. then there's the internal conflict going on, "there's no frigging way i'm going to report a flying sheet of paper to mufon, this is rediculous". there's been some other fascinating interactions i've had with these jokers. must admit, i've been enjoying the ride.
content.summary: Alien humor

content.detailedDescription: Having become a "trained observer", after being tutored by those who are piloting these crafts, these photos are just another days work in my hobby as a ufo photographer. actually, the term ufo appears to have become very nearly obsolete. there isn't much flying going on with what i'm photographing these days. a better term would be idos, as in interdimensional objects. they just appear, and then they leave. no flying involved while they're in the sky. my apologies to mufon's head field investigators. sorry i can't offer you any photos of flying metallic discs. a lot has changed since the roswell crash. the days of black and white tv shows like i love lucy and leave it to beaver are things of the past. during the 65+ years that have gone by since roswell, it's possible that technological advances have not been limited to only our universe. just a thought.
content.summary: Random photos taken during the day

content.detailedDescription: I was driving across the roads of wyoming in order to think about killing myself. i was driving across the thunder basin national grassland as a place to kill myself because i've suffered major depressive disorder and bipolar disorder since i was a teenager. anyway, i left my car after i had parked along side of the road to go a quiet place to shoot myself with a hand gun that i brought from wal-mart. i walked a mile or two away from my car then i found a quiet place to shoot myself, a quiet place three miles away from my car. i'd sat down on the ground of the grassland, ready to shoot myself, when, suddenly, i saw a black helicopter chasing something across the sunrise sky. at first, i thought it was a secret arab attack that the government had found out about, but then, i realize that wasn't true, anymore. when the object got closer to me, i saw that the object was in the shape of a cross with a dome and some windows on it. suddenly, the idea of killing myself quietly was, somehow, gone. as the object kept coming closer to me, i saw something shocking. it may me realize that this cross had pulsating colors of light with some strange sounds and noises coming from the object. also, i saw human beings inside the cross, except, their skin color was magenta and, yet, they somehow had black hair. all of them had black hair and magenta skin, which frighten me to the core. i don't know how i know that, but it felt true to me. i looked at my digital watch, it didn't work at all. it was completely dead. suddenly, the object and the black helicopter that was chasing the object had disappeared. i looked at my digital watch, again, it had been over two hours since i been here in the grassland. i soon ran three miles back to my car and drived the hell away from here. six hours after the ordeal, i began to feel sick, so i went to a hospital. once there, i had a doctor told me that traces of arsenic was found in me. they found some form of red-violet blood-like substance in me that had arsenic in it. i told him about the ordeal, then he'd called an insane asylum and, then, had me taken away. i was there for a year before being release. after that, i went back home and tried to return to a normal life, but i couldn't. it was because of the nightmares that i had. nightmares about tall human-like beings with magenta skin and black hair with, what appeared to me, to be a red-violet blood-like substance being injected to me by a needle-like object. also, i had nightmares about three others with me in, what appeared to me, as some waiting room of a hospital. nightmares of these tall magenta-skinned human beings studying me and the other three with strange medical equipment such as a laser of sorts, and, that red-violet blood-like substances in some blood bags, which made me realize this is the color of their blood. that, plus, when i had a nightmare, i began to feel sick, again. i went to my doctor, and, she had me tested and stuff. when, i was done, my doctor came back and told me that i had arsenic in my systems. that, wasn't all she found, she had also told me that they had found a, what appeared to be, a bio-chip in the shape of a pentadecagon in the front of my neck, which also explained, why, my voice had been froggy since my ordeal. they implanted a implant in me, for what, i don't know. to this day, i still have these nightmares, and, i can't stop getting sick from arsenic because the implant will kill me by, what my doctor said, will cause a fatal electric shock to my heart. tell, others, about my ordeal. also, i found out that those three others were from the black helicopter.
content.summary: Water hill ufo incident.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were leaving my camp on the river near butte la rose/happy town its 2 miles from i-10.  it was around 8:30 pm and i noticed a bright red orange light that was moving very fast and was very low. i told my friend to look immediately.  it looked like a fireball in the sky. it went into the woods and i didn't go chasing it.  it was definitely something.
content.summary: Bright ref orange fireball in sky

content.detailedDescription: I waas trick o treating , i noticed the object when i looked up to fix my cap and i pointed at it and my friend and i were very amazing we called another friend which she was trick or treating in a different neighborhood and she claimed she sees it too, i think the object was looking for something because it just stayed still and then im asuming it noticed people seen it or im asuming the object or thing they were searching for wasnt there. it was in the sky very still like a minute late it moved very slowly with like clouds floting around it then just left ne i felt frozen then nausious and hot. i lost sight once it went ne
content.summary: It was creepy i was very shocked many people seen it i just froze ans my friends posted it on facebook

content.detailedDescription: I live in mn. i just finished a movie and glanced out the window. i noticed bright red pulsating lights. i thought it was unusual as it was in the shape of a c and there were 6+ lights pulsating. i watched it for approximately 6 seconds and then turned to tell my husband to look and when i looked back it was gone. i ran over to the window and searched for it in the sky but saw nothing. when i was looking at it, it was traveling pretty fast to the left.
content.summary: Was looking out window from my couch and saw 6+ red pulsating lights and then it vanished up into the sky. i walked over after and looked outside & there was nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
I took many flash photos of the luna eclipse but the ufo object only appears in one photo.  it was only an instantaneous event that i did not see with my naked eyes but was only capture on one frame of my photos.

the incident occurred in the distant night and i cannot say i saw the object it only appears in the photograph that i had taken.  there were no sounds or any visible effects on the atmosphere, land or anything else that i could see, smell or sense. 

i have the original digital image and can forward to you.
content.summary: Was photo graphing the luna eclipse with my nikon camera and notice the object on the view screen after taking flash photo

content.detailedDescription: Stationary... up.... and fly slow over the mountain..
content.summary: Red red red

content.detailedDescription:
I went to my backyard because we lost electricity for about 30 mins, and this city is very hot in summer so you cant stay in the room without electricity, i was sitting in the backyard looking the stars but i noticed something was moving in the sky, so after blinking several times i could see the v shape of the object, it was flying south direction in a constant slow speed, with no sound, for about 15 secs until the back neighbor wall obstructed my vision. i was "in shock" trying to figure out what the object was and did not react to go to the roof to keep seeing it.

something curious, besides the no sound, it was the surface of the object, regardless it was solid black, i could see the stars it was blocking but blurred like the effect you get with the glass.

i draw the sight with my poor tools, but that is basically what i saw
content.summary: Black, v shape, no sound, really big

content.detailedDescription: Bright green glowing object fell out of sky over okc on halloween night
content.summary: Bright green glowing object fell out of sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving work peddling on my road bike headed south down allen street at the intersection of allen street and delancey street i first noticed a dark colored or black aircraft no larger than a commercial airplane in my southern view of the sky. i can remember some red and green lights on the craft some constant others blinking. the aircraft had to be over the chinatown area when i first spotted it hovering above at building height in the sky. what made this aircraft stand out from the norm was that it made no sound, had no emissions and moved in ways that was not practical to any other type aircraft i had ever seen before. after seeing this and the ufo having my full attention i continued my ride south to the manhattan bridge in which the operator of the ufo seemed to somehow know that them or it was being observed by me because its movements changed quickly to almost one of which i would say it was following me by not directly or obvious because it was able to disappear in seconds by moving out of sight by going behind buildings then reappearing in a different position from before with no sounds from an engine of any sort jet or propeller. by this time i was on the manhattan bridge and i was so excited to be that close to seeing one in person that i wanted to take a picture with my phone but could not every time i aimed for a picture shot it would move completely out of visual sight which made it made it quite clear that who ever or what ever was operating it did not want to get caught on camera not to mention i had called my brother at the time while on the manhattan bridge to explain what i was seeing and what was going on as we where in conversation and that i would hopefully have a pic to prove what i saw. after getting off the bridge i saw the ufo appear in the sky again on atlantic ave to my right while heading east a block after the barclay's center, it then completely moved out of sight.
content.summary: First saw ufo while riding home heading south on allen street before crossing over delancey street i noticed a weird shaped aircraft of some sort that moved almost like a helicopter but faster and had no sound of any engine or any emissions.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 25,2014 at approximately 4:42 pm i was doing yard work. the day was sunny with scattered clouds. having lived at this location for almost 30 yrs.(approx. 7 miles north of o'hare) i have watched and know the traffic patterns of aircraft vectored into and out of o'hare. one traffic route takes the inbound aircraft almost directly overhead heading on a se route always hearing the planes throttling up or down. when one moment i looked up and saw a bright solid silent light traversing from sw to se in a straight path approximately 2 to 3 miles further south (closer to o'hare). this was by no means any kind of aircraft that i have ever seen.
i stood there dumbfounded for a moment and then quickly grabbed my 15 power binoculars which i have always hanging in the garage. when i finally  relocated the "white" object on focused on it, it now appeared as a dull grey oval, like looking at a donut on its side. after a few moments i lost sight of it as it continued south beyond the trees. it took me a few moments to digest what i have just witnessed and am still thinking of it today. and i know it wasn't swampgas or a weather balloon!!
content.summary: Glowing silent white travelling southeast approx. 3-4 miles north of o'hare . when viewed through binoculars appeared as dull grey oval object with darker markings.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to go to the work and when i was getting into my car  i happened to look up. that's when i saw the craft. the craft is total white and glossy in appearance. it went silently through the sky. there was no windows or anything like that. the ship looked boomerang in shape but as it moved forward toward the south it would pivot 90 degrees to the right and then pivot back to its original position. i watched it fly over the club and over my condo i'm think the elevation was  between 500-700 feet from the ground. the flight lasted for about 5-6 to six minutes. i wanted to follow it but at the rate of speed it was flying and the amount of time to get out of the parking lot the craft was long gone.
content.summary: Boomerang object flew over head rotating twisting 90 degees to right and back in a straight line heading south

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch, that is roof covered,facing west, it was 1:10 am sunday morning june 10 of 2013. when i noticed that my front yard became orange from a light source above my home. the light was so bright that i could barely see my front lamp post light. so i proceeded to step off my porch and out onto our walkway to see what it was. when i looked up i saw an orb shaped object about 40 feet above my home heading slowly to the west. needless to say i was stunned, i thought it might have been a chinese lantern, balloon, or something else easily explainable. i didn't notice any of that. the object was 5 to 10 feet in diameter and all i could hear was a static electric crackling. i was also looking to see if i could see any structure around, above, or hanging from the object, i could not see anything. the object continued across my street and across a small park in front of my house, and at all time lighting up the ground as it moved. the light from the object emanated from all directions. it proceeded to move over the homes just on the other side of the park and the roof tops lit up as well. i got my phone camera (not the best) but its all i had at the time. took a video around 40 seconds then it blinked out. the last 15 seconds of the video is me moving the camera around trying to find the object again, but never did. i took four screen shots from the video to send as well. i just want answers, it was the strangest thing i have seen. thank you for your time
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sitting on front porch, noticed front yard light up an orange color, step off porch noticed object 40 feet above home

content.detailedDescription:
Step out of garage, noticed orange light.
orange colouration.

unidentified flying object, witness very knowlageable about aircraft.

went in straight line, made smoke like trail when last seen, before dissapearing

excitement, erieness, etc.

glanced at mother for split second, looked back, object was gone.
content.summary: Orange light, no sound, not plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out on my porch looking for orion's belt around 7:30, just dark in southern sky.  saw the following:
1. large triangle of 3 large steady lights.  only saw one star to the south
2. checked the sky for clouds, did not see any.
3. the lights could have been in very high airplane heights.
4. i watched the lights for at least 10 - 15 seconds. 
5. lights continued on but no movement was seen.
6. saw no planes anywhere.
7. all of a sudden the two southernmost lights went out from one side to another.
8. the last of the three stayed on for another 10 seconds.
9. i went into the house to get my camera and when i got back the last of the three went out from the south side of the light to the north side.
10. did not see movement of any kind except for two lights going out simultaneously and then one light going out.
11. went back out periodically and saw no more unusual lights.
12. went back out each night around 7:15p - 7:45p hoping to see a repeat with my camera. 
13. did see orion's belt finally.
14. my feeling was that this experience was definitely not stars or planets.
content.summary: Triangle of 3 large steady lights in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my deck in roanoke va,the evening was cold and clear  it was around mid-night in feb. 2008. i observed two very bright lights in the distance to the north coming towards me. i thought at first they might be helecopters or something, but there was no sound. as they came closer and flew slowly overhead several things struck me as odd. first of all these were two black triangular shaped objects that glided perfectly silent above my house with a very large ball of light in the center of each. this light emintated (as best i can describe) sort of a static type of electricty of different colors. there were no other lights of any type on the objects (such as blinking running lights) normally seen on most aircraft. again; these craft were perfectly silent and passed directly above me as they moved to the south and dissapeared. i lost sight at that time due to other houses and mountains in the way of my view. i thought it was quite incredable but also realized it could have been some type of stealth aircraft, although i've seen plenty of stealth aircraft and none looked like these perfectly black triangles.
content.summary: Observed two bright lights in distance to north coming towards me, as they approached and flew overhead noticed they were black triangles with light in middle, silent

content.detailedDescription: I was in the army at the time stationed at aberdeen proving ground, maryland.  i was in training and my class was from midnight until 7 a.M.  we were marching from barracks area to classroom and i happened to look up.  going across the night sky from my right to my left was an elliptical-shaped object moving slowly in a straight line.  having had read about ufo's before i immediately recognized this as what most people called a "cigar shape" object.  this was elliptically-shaped, or the shape that a circle makes when turned away from you at an angle.  the width was about one-fifth its length.  it was a burnt-orange color.  there is no way i could assume its size, but i can say that at arm's length, holding my thumb and forefinger about 5/8" apart was the length of the object.  it made no noise, and there was no obvious emission.  there were no lights.  i observed it for about a minute, looking up and then forward alternately so i wouldn't meander out of line.  one of my first thoughts was that it made sense to see something like this since we were close to washington, d.C.  i did not alert anyone in my group about it.  i am a reasonably intelligent person so i know that this was not anything earthly.
content.summary: {dr|observed slow-moving red-orange elliptical shape object going in straight line across the sky

content.detailedDescription: 3-red lights, very bright then a white spot-light in the middle bottom of the craft. i ran outside and could hear a hiss as it flew over the house next-door.Maybe the size of a small jet, i have seen them over 25 times in a two month period, some times more then one at a time, memorial day-july 4th and more then a couple times there were fireworks going off all around them?? i never seen anything like it.They just fade out. one time there was one heading south-east and a storm front coming from the southwest poured down rain and it turned to the north-east.
content.summary: Bright red pulsating lights with a white spot light on the bottom. it made a hiss sound but not a jet or traditional motor for thrust, they stopped and changed direction. pulsate and fade out..No blinking lights!

content.detailedDescription: I was with my wife and 2 friends sitting outside talking. we were having a good time i looked over to the western sky and noticed 3 objects moving in a sideways triangle fashion, they were brighter than stars. i thought they may have been aircraft but the triangle formation began to rotate, i pointed it out to my wife and friends we jumped up and began to watch. the formation continued to rotate and change direction, then began the dull pulsating light emitting from the lights. the rotating stopped 2 lights departed from the formation going in a slow southward direction and disappeared the reaming light continued moving eastward the stopped, it hovered and pulsates then disappeared with no trace. we were all stunned by the event, my wife and i have seen ufos before but this was the longest sighting at around 10 mins.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights in rotating triangle formation over barboursville wv

content.detailedDescription: We were fishing on the san clemente pier in 1998 around 2am, there were approx 5-8 of us fishing on the pier this eve, half drunk, i was not drinking, at around 2 am an item approx 1.5 miles away just south of the san onofre nuke plant and directly off camp pendleton, approx 1/2 mile off shore ascended from the pacific ocean, 4 of us watched it happen and questioned what we were seeing, we were able to see the light below the water and above it when it came out, it hovered about 20ft above the water, this us a guesstimate, for about 20 seconds, it continued to change colors during this time, after 20 seconds the item shot faster them a bullet to the south east over camp pendleton and disappeared. no noises were heard, no wake could be seen. neither i or anyone there could determine or suggest what the item could have been. i was 17 when this occurred and knew i had just seen either some super top secret craft or a alien craft, either way i never reported it in fear the government would do something to me as i felt i should have never saw what i did that night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: {dr]item ascended from under water, hovered for approx 20 seconds then bee lined to the se
